channel.title: GenAI on Bret Staudt Willet, Ph.D.
channel.description: Recent content in GenAI on Bret Staudt Willet, Ph.D.

item.title: Good Morning, CEHHS!
item.description: Good morning, everyone! My name is Bret Staudt Willet. I’m an Assistant Professor in Instructional Systems and Learning Technologies, and I have the privilege of chairing our college’s Faculty Advisory Committee this next year.

item.title: New paper: Initial discussions of ChatGPT in education-related subreddits
item.description: There’s a good bit of good news coming in the next few weeks, and I wanted to kick things off my highlighting a new publication that just came out in the Journal of Research on Technology in Education: “Initial discussions of ChatGPT in education-related subreddits” (DOI:10.
